import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { ArrowRight, CheckCircle, Phone, Wifi, Shield, Zap, Globe, Users, Star, Play, Award, TrendingUp } from 'lucide-react'; const Home = () => { const features = [ { icon: , title: "Lightning Fast Speeds", description: "Experience blazing-fast internet speeds up to 1Gbps with our fiber-optic network infrastructure." }, { icon: , title: "Secure & Reliable", description: "99.9% uptime guarantee with enterprise-grade security protecting your data and communications." }, { icon: , title: "24/7 Expert Support", description: "Round-the-clock technical support from certified professionals ready to help you anytime." } ]; const services = [ { icon: , title: "Mobile Services", description: "Unlimited data plans with 5G coverage across the nation", link: "/services/mobile" }, { icon: , title: "Internet Plans", description: "High-speed fiber internet for homes and businesses", link: "/services/internet" }, { icon: , title: "Business Solutions", description: "Enterprise-grade telecommunications for growing companies", link: "/services/business" } ]; const stats = [ { number: "1M+", label: "Happy Customers", color: "text-white" }, { number: "99.9%", label: "Network Uptime", color: "text-blue-200" }, { number: "24/7", label: "Customer Support", color: "text-white" }, { number: "50+", label: "Cities Covered", color: "text-blue-200" } ]; const testimonials = [ { name: "Sarah Johnson", role: "Business Owner", company: "TechStart Inc.", rating: 5, text: "Zuree Telecom transformed our business communications. The reliability and speed are exceptional!" }, { name: "Michael Chen", role: "IT Director", company: "Global Solutions", rating: 5, text: "Outstanding service and support. Their business solutions have streamlined our operations significantly." }, { name: "Emily Rodriguez", role: "Residential Customer", company: "Home User", rating: 5, text: "The best internet service I've ever had. Fast, reliable, and great customer service." } ]; return (
{/* Hero Section */}
#1 Telecom Provider 2024

Connected Solutions for a Digital Future

Experience next-generation telecommunications with unmatched reliability, speed, and innovation. Connect your world with Zuree Telecom.

Explore Services
{stats.map((stat, index) => (
{stat.number}
{stat.label}
))}

Quick Start

{["Choose your plan", "Easy installation", "Stay connected"].map((step, index) => (
{step}
))}
Get Started Now
{/* Features Section */}

Why Choose Zuree Telecom?

We deliver cutting-edge telecommunications solutions with unmatched reliability, speed, and customer support to keep you connected to what matters most.

{features.map((feature, index) => (
{feature.icon}

{feature.title}

{feature.description}

))}
{/* Services Preview */}

Our Services

Comprehensive telecommunications solutions designed for individuals, families, and businesses of all sizes.

{services.map((service, index) => (
{service.icon}

{service.title}

{service.description}

Learn More
))}
{/* Testimonials */}

What Our Customers Say

Don't just take our word for it. Here's what our satisfied customers have to say about our services.

{testimonials.map((testimonial, index) => (
{[...Array(testimonial.rating)].map((_, i) => ( ))}

"{testimonial.text}"

{testimonial.name}

{testimonial.role}

{testimonial.company}

))}
{/* CTA Section */}

Ready to Transform Your Connectivity?

Join thousands of satisfied customers who have upgraded their telecommunications experience with Zuree Telecom. Get started today and discover the difference.

Get Started Today View Plans
); }; export default Home;
